BCash/Bitcoin Cash/BCH is not true to the Bitcoin whitepaper.  1: A payee (You, I, & Merchants) aren't capable of preventing double signings of a TX.  2: The whitepaper says the only way around this is if the payee is aware of all TXs.  3: You can't do this with an SPV client.  https://t.co/55NmcRO8v7
